greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Quotients A128452(p+1)/p for prime p = A000040(n).
comment: a(n) coincides with A128357(n) from n = 2 up to n = 6.
formula: a(n) = A020639(((p+1)^p - 1)/p^2), i.e., the smallest prime factor of ((p+1)^p - 1)/p^2, where p = A000040(n).
results.author: _Alexander Adamchuk_, Mar 05 2007, Mar 09 2007
ext: Terms a(14) onward from _Max Alekseyev_, May 05 2010
